description: This course is focused on teaching the only fundamentals you need to know to create a successful niche website for that can generate a passive income stream as an affiliate marketer. We tend to get distracted when it comes to internet marketing and just need a blueprint or system to follow. Whether you promote affiliate products, CPA offers, want to start a website, just want to create a blog, sell your products, or have your own business. The steps remain the same. This course has a focus on using search engine optimization and keyword research to attract visitors through the search engines, and essentially generate free traffic. This allows sales to be generated on auto-pilot without having to spend money on advertising.
title: Affiliate Marketing Using Niche Websites, Keywords, and SEO
instructors: Build Your Business in 7 Steps! Steve Baro
